00033 CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::CSwordLexiconModuleInfo( SWModule* module) : CSwordModuleInfo(module) {
00034     m_entryList = 0;
00035 }
00036 
00037 CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::CSwordLexiconModuleInfo( const CSwordLexiconModuleInfo& m ) : CSwordModuleInfo(m) {
00038     delete m_entryList;
00039     m_entryList = 0;    
00040         
00041     if (m.m_entryList) {
00042         m_entryList = new QStringList();
00043         *m_entryList = *m.m_entryList;//copy list items
00044     }
00045 }
00046 
00047 CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::~CSwordLexiconModuleInfo(){
00048     delete m_entryList;
00049     m_entryList = 0;
00050 }
00051 
00053 QStringList* const CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::entries(){
00054     if (!module())
00055         return 0;
00056 
00057     if (!m_entryList) {
00058         m_entryList = new QStringList();
00059 
00060     const bool lexiconCache = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::lexiconCache);
00061         bool read = false;
00062 
00063         if (lexiconCache){
00064         QFile f1(
00065             QString::fromLatin1("%1/%2")
00066                 .arg(KGlobal::dirs()->saveLocation("data", "bibletime/cache/"))
00067                 .arg( name() )
00068         );
00069         
00070       if ( f1.open( IO_ReadOnly ) ){
00071         QDataStream s( &f1 );
00072             QString v;
00073         s >> v;
00074             if (v == config(ModuleVersion) ) {
00075                 s >> *m_entryList;
00076                 read = true;
00077             }
00078             f1.close();
00079       }
00080         }
00081 
00082 
00083         if (!read){
00084             (*module()) = TOP;          
00085         do {
00086             m_entryList->append(QString::fromLocal8Bit(module()->KeyText())); //UTF8, Latin1 or Local8Bit??
00087             (*module())++;
00088         } while (!module()->Error());
00089 
00090         if (m_entryList->first().stripWhiteSpace().isEmpty())
00091             m_entryList->remove( m_entryList->begin() );            
00092 
00093             if (lexiconCache){
00094             // create cache
00095                 QString dir = KGlobal::dirs()->saveLocation("data", "bibletime/cache/");
00096         QFile f2( QString::fromLatin1("%1/%2").arg(dir).arg( name() ) );
00097         if (f2.open( IO_WriteOnly )){
00098           QDataStream s( &f2 );
00099                 s << config(CSwordModuleInfo::ModuleVersion);
00100                 s << *m_entryList;
00101               f2.close();
00102         }
00103             }
00104             (*module()) = TOP;          
00105         }
00106     }   
00107     return m_entryList;
00108 }
00109 
00111 const bool CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::snap(){
00112     bool ret = false;
00113     if(module()->getRawEntry()){    //snap to the current entry
00114         ret = true;
00115     }
00116     return ret;
00117 }
00118 
00120 CSwordModuleInfo* CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::clone(){
00121     return new CSwordLexiconModuleInfo(*this);
00122 }
